we know how crucial efficient collaboration and seamless file sharing are for tackling design challenges. Add in the need for powerful hardware, and the process can quickly become overwhelming. But what if thereâ€™s a solution that eliminates these headaches and empowers your team to design without limits?

Introducing SOLIDWORKS Cloud Apps and 3DEXPERIENCE

With SOLIDWORKS Cloud Apps, you donâ€™t need a high-performance PC or even traditional file-sharing platforms to stay productive. These browser-based tools work on any deviceâ€”whether itâ€™s a lightweight Chromebook, tablet, or even your personal laptopâ€”letting you focus on creating innovative designs without hardware barriers.

Key Benefits for FRC Teams and SOLIDWORKS Users

No High-End Hardware Required

  • Access powerful design tools like xDesign, xShape, and more right from your browser. No need for a workstationâ€”just log in and start designing from anywhere.

Seamless File Sharing

  • With the 3DEXPERIENCE platform, all your files are securely stored in the cloud. Share designs with teammates, mentors, or collaborators in real time without worrying about outdated versions or missing files.

Offline Access with Desktop SOLIDWORKS

  • Need to work without internet access? Files downloaded or opened via the SOLIDWORKS 3DEXPERIENCE add-in are cached locally, so you can make modifications or prepare files for 3D printing even when offline.

Collaborate Like a Pro

  • Leave comments, assign tasks, and track progress across your teamâ€”all through the cloud platform. Whether youâ€™re brainstorming or building, collaboration has never been easier.

Designed for Teams Like Yours

Whether youâ€™re an FRC team designing your next competition robot or a SOLIDWORKS user managing complex projects, these tools adapt to your needs:
Streamline file management
Reduce dependency on powerful PCs
Collaborate effectivelyâ€”even across devices and locations

Get Started Today

The best part? SOLIDWORKS offers free licenses for FRC teams, including access to the 3DEXPERIENCE platform. Donâ€™t let hardware limitations or file-sharing issues hold you back from your design goals!

What design challenges are you facing? Letâ€™s talk solutions! Drop your questions or share your thoughts in the comments, and letâ€™s solve them together!
